name: Triton International Limited
description: Triton International Limited is a leading global provider of intermodal freight transportation solutions, specializing in the leasing and sale of cargo containers. Founded in 2016 through the merger of Triton Container International and the container leasing business of TAL International, Triton serves a diverse customer base, including shipping lines, freight forwarders, and other logistics providers. The company operates one of the largest fleets of intermodal containers in the world, offering a wide range of container types, including standard dry containers, refrigerated containers, and specialized units for various cargo needs. With a commitment to operational efficiency and customer service, Triton focuses on enhancing the supply chain for its clients by providing innovative leasing solutions and maintaining high-quality equipment. The company is also dedicated to sustainability, investing in environmentally friendly practices across its operations. Triton's extensive network and global presence enable it to capitalize on opportunities in the growing international trade market, positioning itself as a key player in the logistics and transportation sector.
